name: MindFi
headline: Transforming Mental Health for Corporate Asia
description: MindFi is an app that reduces burnout and improves mental health for employees. We sell to companies in Asia such as Deutsche Bank, KPMG, PatSnap, Visa. The team is headquartered in Singapore and consists of Bjorn, (ex-Zendesk product manager), psychologist Anita Sadasivan (UMich alum, ex-Raffles Hospital), Leon 2X startup founder with 2 exits and Gangeshwar, an award-winning AI engineer.

founders.name: Bjorn Lee, Founder
founders.description: Bjorn Lee is a serial entrepreneur and technology executive with experience in Asia and Silicon Valley. Bjorn is currently the founder CEO of MindFi, a B2B mental health & wellbeing platform. He was an ex-product manager at Zendesk (who acquired Zopim Chat) and founder CEO of Stickery, an edu-tech startup funded by AngelPad & Google Ventures. Bjorn is an alumnus of National University of Singapore (NUS) and the NUS Overseas College (NOC) program at Stanford University.

founders.name: Gangeshwar Krishnamurthy, Founder
founders.description: AI Scientist turned startup founder. Ex-A*STAR, Ex-Microsoft. Currently building MindFi's AI-assisted platform for working professionals in Asia.

founders.name: Leon CK Leong, Founder
founders.description: I currently manage Business Development and Client Success @ MindFi. Previously, I co-founded and sold 2 tech start-ups and lost 250 lbs.. Yep, start-up life is a toughie alright. XD

founders.name: Anita Sadasivan, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and Chief Wellbeing Officer at MindFi - A B2B Mental Health & Wellbeing company for Corporate Asia.

# Employee mental health,_made easy for all._
# Employee mental health,_made easy for all._
MindFi is a cost-friendly employee assistance and wellbeing platform that helps small and medium teams prioritise workplace mental health — timely and proactively.
MindFi is a cost-friendly EAP and wellbeing platform that helps small and medium teams prioritise workplace mental health, proactively.
[Start Free Trial](https://www.mindfi.co/<https:/hub.mindfi.co/signup-trial/>)
[View Demo](https://www.mindfi.co/</demo>)
### Trusted by leading teams & organisations
![](https://mindfi.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Funding-Societies-2.png)
![](https://mindfi.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/RowingSA-1.png)
![](https://mindfi.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Mcgregor-coxall-1.png)
![](https://mindfi.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/IDC-2.png)
![](https://mindfi.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Collar-group-2.png)
![](https://mindfi.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/DCI-Data-centers-2.png)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201200%201200'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20300%20300'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20300%20300'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201200%201200'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20300%20300'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201200%201200'%2F%3E)
## Support employee mental health _without trade-offs_
MindFi solves the mental health challenge for small and medium teams — Enterprise solutions are complex and costly, while traditional low-cost options lack effectiveness. We deliver an affordable yet proactive solution in four ways:
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201368%201416'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201280%201492'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20657%201002'%2F%3E)
## On-demand therapy
Therapy needs to be timely. With MindFi, employees can connect with a professional of their choice within 24 hours and with just 3 clicks.
[See How](https://www.mindfi.co/</therapy>)
## Multi-channel support
Besides therapy, we include other “self-care” resources like media content, self assessments, online communities, and 24/7 text & chat support, to ensure that employees can access support from whatever suits them best.
[Learn More](https://www.mindfi.co/</self-care>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20864%20843'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201116%201140'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20755%20848'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20864%20825'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%202316%201443'%2F%3E)
## Real time analytics & insights
Keep an active pulse on employee utilisation with your program and its impact on wellbeing, along with actionable insights to address potential issues before they arise.
[See How](https://www.mindfi.co/</insights>)
## Employee assistance with ease
Never manage your wellbeing services manually again — launch instantly and run on autopilot with our dashboard. Plus, your employees will get instant access to support with an easy to use web & mobile app.
[Learn More](https://www.mindfi.co/</platform>)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201586%201078'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201538%20950'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20392%20779'%2F%3E)
# Making a _true difference_ for small & medium teams
## 40
%
Active platform utilisation (traditional EAPs typically only see 0-5%)
## 82
%
Of employees experience wellbeing improvements in just one month
## 30
%
Reduction in depression (collaborative study with a major hospital group)
# Real results for people & culture teams
> “
> MindFi has been invaluable in our journey of elevating employees’ health and wellbeing. The app is engaging and easy to use, and the anonymized analytics help our team focus on the areas our employees need the most support in, without compromising their privacy. 
> Sabrina JaksaChief People Experience Officer, Funding Societies | Modalku at Funding Societies
> “
> At WTW, our employees' wellbeing has become a top business priority. MindFi has supported our employees across Asia Pacific with an engaging and effective platform that is easy & practical to use. The app's solutions effectively strengthened our resilience in the time we needed it most. Thank you! 
> Pheona ChuaRegional Senior Consultant - Corporate Health and Wellbeing at Willis Towers Watson
> “
> On behalf of the Asia Pacific Government Engagement team, I would like to express our gratitude for MindFi's partnership, leadership and professionalism as we embarked on our journey to support our team members' mental and emotional wellbeing. We are satisfied with the quality of support we have received thus far, and are all looking forward to continuing our collaboration! 
> Debbie HengManager, Operations, Asia Pacific Government Engagement at Visa
> “
> Concerns about mental well-being existed before COVID-19, but stigma made it difficult to address. By partnering with MindFi, we're able to eradicate this stigma and increase our employees' mental strength. The most powerful aspect of MindFi is the access to regular, highly-detailed updates on organizational well-being. The insights and recommendations help us make effective, data driven decisions. 
> Thomas SchellererMD of Pepperl + Fuchs
> “
> At Patsnap, we are always looking for innovative ways to look after our employees' wellbeing, so l'm excited to be working with the MindFi team to provide tools to support PatSnappers' mental health - both inside and outside of work. 
> Jeffrey TiongCEO & Founder at Patsnap
[View all customer stories](https://www.mindfi.co/<https:/hub.mindfi.co/signup-trial/>)
# FAQ
### [Are you an EAP vendor?](https://www.mindfi.co/<#>)
Yes we are. We have a network of certified therapists and coaches that your employees can book appointments with, in 24 hours or less, through our on-demand digital system.
### [What’s the difference between MindFi and a traditional EAP?](https://www.mindfi.co/<#>)
  * **On demand therapy:** Employees can [schedule a session](https://www.mindfi.co/</therapy>) with a professional in 24 hours or less, through our digital platform.
  * **Emphasis on self-care:** While some EAPs may offer limited self-care resources, we prioritise it equally with therapy, [providing five unique formats](https://www.mindfi.co/<https:/mindfi.co/self-care/>) for employees to engage with.
  * **Real time analytics & insights: **Our [analytics dashboard](https://www.mindfi.co/<https:/mindfi.co/insights/>) enables informed EAP and wellbeing strategy decisions, unlike traditional EAPs focused solely on utilisation rates.
  * **Platform-driven:** We empower employers and employees to [access their EAP with ultimate ease](https://www.mindfi.co/<https:/mindfi.co/platform/>), with our tech and automations. Traditional EAPs are still focused on manual processes.


### [Do you offer standalone services (like Therapy)?](https://www.mindfi.co/<#>)
No, we do not. Every MindFi plan will include [therapy](https://www.mindfi.co/<http:/mindfi.co/how-we-work/features/therapy>), the [self-care resources](https://www.mindfi.co/<https:/mindfi.co/self-care/>), & the [real time analytics & insights](https://www.mindfi.co/<http:/mindfi.co/how-we-work/features/insights>) dashboard. We offer this because we believe this delivers a more holistic impact on employee mental health.
### [What countries can you cover for therapy sessions?](https://www.mindfi.co/<#>)
**Asia:** Singapore, Malaysia, India, Vietnam, China, Philippines, Hong Kong, Thailand, Indonesia, Taiwan, South Korea, Japan, Myanmar, Cambodia, Laos, Bangladesh, Maldives, Russia
**Oceania:** Australia, New Zealand **Americas:** USA, Canada, Chile, Peru, Brazil
**Europe:** United Kingdom, Switzerland, Sweden, Spain, France, Poland, Portugal
**Middle East & Africa:** United Arab Emirates, Egypt, Iran, South Africa, Zambia
### [What languages do you support in the MindFi employee app?](https://www.mindfi.co/<#>)
English, Mandarin, Japanese, Korean, Bahasa Melayu, Bahasa Indonesia, Thai, Vietnamese, Marathi (India).
### [Do you have a trial?](https://www.mindfi.co/<#>)
Yes, we have a free 14 day trial where you can experience MindFi as an employer and employee. [Sign up for one here](https://www.mindfi.co/<https:/hub.mindfi.co/signup-trial>). No credit card or commitment required.
### [What is pricing like?](https://www.mindfi.co/<#>)
Our plans include a fixed platform subscription cost and a variable cost component for therapy utilisation. Get an [instant custom quote here](https://www.mindfi.co/<https:/mindfi.co/pricing>).
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201707%202560'%2F%3E)

## Support employee mental health _without trade-offs_
MindFi solves the mental health challenge for small and medium teams — Enterprise solutions are complex and costly, while traditional low-cost options lack effectiveness. We deliver an affordable yet proactive solution in four ways:
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201368%201416'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201280%201492'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20657%201002'%2F%3E)
## On-demand therapy
Therapy needs to be timely. With MindFi, employees can connect with a professional of their choice within 24 hours and with just 3 clicks.
See How⟨28⟩
## Multi-channel support
Besides therapy, we include other “self-care” resources like media content, self assessments, online communities, and 24/7 text & chat support, to ensure that employees can access support from whatever suits them best.
Learn More⟨29⟩
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20864%20843'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201116%201140'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20755%20848'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20864%20825'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%202316%201443'%2F%3E)
## Real time analytics & insights
Keep an active pulse on employee utilisation with your program and its impact on wellbeing, along with actionable insights to address potential issues before they arise.
See How⟨30⟩
## Employee assistance with ease
Never manage your wellbeing services manually again — launch instantly and run on autopilot with our dashboard. Plus, your employees will get instant access to support with an easy to use web & mobile app.
Learn More⟨31⟩
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201586%201078'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%201538%20950'%2F%3E)
![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D'http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg'%20viewBox%3D'0%200%20392%20779'%2F%3E)

## 82
%

%

# Real results for people & culture teams
> “

View all customer stories⟨26⟩
# FAQ
### Are you an EAP vendor?⟨2⟩
Yes we are. We have a network of certified therapists and coaches that your employees can book appointments with, in 24 hours or less, through our on-demand digital system.
### What’s the difference between MindFi and a traditional EAP?⟨2⟩
  * **On demand therapy:** Employees can schedule a session⟨28⟩ with a professional in 24 hours or less, through our digital platform.
  * **Emphasis on self-care:** While some EAPs may offer limited self-care resources, we prioritise it equally with therapy, providing five unique formats⟨10⟩ for employees to engage with.
  * **Real time analytics & insights: **Our analytics dashboard⟨6⟩ enables informed EAP and wellbeing strategy decisions, unlike traditional EAPs focused solely on utilisation rates.
  * **Platform-driven:** We empower employers and employees to access their EAP with ultimate ease⟨32⟩, with our tech and automations. Traditional EAPs are still focused on manual processes.


### Do you offer standalone services (like Therapy)?⟨2⟩
No, we do not. Every MindFi plan will include therapy⟨33⟩, the self-care resources⟨10⟩, & the real time analytics & insights⟨34⟩ dashboard. We offer this because we believe this delivers a more holistic impact on employee mental health.
### What countries can you cover for therapy sessions?⟨2⟩
**Asia:** Singapore, Malaysia, India, Vietnam, China, Philippines, Hong Kong, Thailand, Indonesia, Taiwan, South Korea, Japan, Myanmar, Cambodia, Laos, Bangladesh, Maldives, Russia
**Oceania:** Australia, New Zealand **Americas:** USA, Canada, Chile, Peru, Brazil
**Europe:** United Kingdom, Switzerland, Sweden, Spain, France, Poland, Portugal
**Middle East & Africa:** United Arab Emirates, Egypt, Iran, South Africa, Zambia
### What languages do you support in the MindFi employee app?⟨2⟩
English, Mandarin, Japanese, Korean, Bahasa Melayu, Bahasa Indonesia, Thai, Vietnamese, Marathi (India).
### Do you have a trial?⟨2⟩
Yes, we have a free 14 day trial where you can experience MindFi as an employer and employee. Sign up for one here⟨35⟩. No credit card or commitment required.
### What is pricing like?⟨2⟩
Our plans include a fixed platform subscription cost and a variable cost component for therapy utilisation. Get an instant custom quote here⟨36⟩.

generated_description:
MindFi, founded in 2017 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S21, is on a mission to transform mental health across corporate Asia. Headquartered in Singapore, the company has developed an innovative app that focuses on reducing burnout and enhancing the mental wellbeing of employees. Think of it as a modern employee assistance program (EAP) tailored for small to medium-sized companies – and they’ve already struck partnerships with big names like Deutsche Bank, KPMG, PatSnap, and Visa.

The team behind MindFi is impressive, featuring Bjorn, an ex-Zendesk product manager; Anita Sadasivan, a psychologist and UMich alum; Leon, a two-time startup founder with successful exits; and Gangeshwar, an award-winning AI engineer. This blend of expertise is what drives MindFi’s value proposition: a proactive approach to mental health, combining cutting-edge technology with psychological insights.

What sets MindFi apart? They offer on-demand therapy that allows employees to book sessions within 24 hours, as well as a robust suite of self-care resources. Employees can access media content, self-assessments, and support through online communities, ensuring that help is available whenever they need it.

MindFi operates in the realm of B2B mental health solutions, catering primarily to employers who recognize the importance of their teams' mental wellness. They provide real-time insights through an analytics dashboard to help organizations maintain a pulse on employee well-being, which is a considerable advantage over traditional EAPs that typically lag in responsiveness and adaptability.

The results speak for themselves. With a 40% active platform utilization rate (traditional EAPs often hover around a measly 0-5%), and 82% of employees noticing improvements in their well-being within just a month, MindFi is proving that a fresh approach can yield significant benefits. Their app is not only user-friendly but also engaging, making it easier for employees to seek help without the stigma often associated with mental health issues.

As for who can use MindFi? They are equipped to provide support across multiple countries in Asia and beyond, including Singapore, Malaysia, India, and even further afield to the USA and UK. They offer a free 14-day trial, making it easy for companies to see the benefits without any commitment.

In a landscape where mental health tools are often overlooked or inadequately funded, MindFi steps in as a much-needed ally for businesses and their employees. If you’re seeking to bolster mental health initiatives in the workplace, MindFi is definitely worth a look. You can find more information and start your journey at [MindFi.co](https://www.mindfi.co).
